function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Service encounters as a focal element in service provision","Impact":"Failure to manage service encounters can lead to customer dissatisfaction and damaged firm-customer relationships","Mitigation":"Implement customer service training and feedback mechanisms to improve service encounters","Technologies":"Customer feedback software, training platforms","People":"Customers, service providers","Owner":"Service providers"},{"Description":"Servicescapes as the environments for service encounters","Impact":"Inadequate servicescapes can negatively impact customer experience and perception of service quality","Mitigation":"Design and maintain pleasant and functional servicescapes, consider environmental factors","Technologies":"Environmental design software, IoT sensors for environmental monitoring","People":"Customers, service providers, environment designers","Owner":"Service providers, environment designers"},{"Description":"Study of the contexts in which service provision takes place","Impact":"Failure to understand service contexts can lead to ineffective marketing strategies and service delivery","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on service contexts, adapt marketing strategies based on context","Technologies":"Data analytics, market research tools","People":"Marketers, service providers","Owner":"Marketers, service providers"}]}
